description: An innovative GEC system that harnesses the power of Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompting and rubric-guided evaluations to enhance correction quality and accuracy. Built on the foundation of advanced reasoning models like GPT-3.5-turbo-1106 and integrating teacher-student model feedback, it sets a new standard for contextual grammatical corrections.
